name: Frogger 2
description: Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-4, HD (High Definition). Hop along with Frogger® 2 as you travel through more than 15 challenging levels filled with new enemies and obstacles. Each of the 5 exotic environments provides a new set of challenges but beware of the bosses that try to thwart your progress.  Compete with up to 4 friends in 2 online multiplayer modes – Race Mode and Jewel Duel. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
